Interface Menu

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DessertsMenu, DrinksMenu, GenericMenu, MainCourseMenu, PromotionalMenu
public interface Menu extends Serializable
A Menu interface which to allow the use of polymorphism.
